name: Spiritual Self-Defense and Energy Protection
description: Training in shielding techniques and energetic sovereignty to defend against psychic, ritualistic, and esoteric attacks.

cards.title: Understanding Spiritual Attacks and Energetic Warfare
cards.description: Recognizing when energy manipulation tactics are being used to control or weaken individuals.
cards.summaryText: Charts the signatures of ritual programming, psychic siphoning, and legacy control grids to flag active assaults.

cards.title: Techniques for Spiritual Shielding
cards.description: Methods for creating, maintaining, and reinforcing spiritual protection barriers.
bulletpoints: Developing personal energy fields and aura cleansing.
Using sigils, symbols, and intent-based protections.
Neutralizing directed spiritual or energetic attacks.
cards.summaryText: Supplies daily shielding drills, symbolic wards, and countermeasures to blunt directed energetic strikes.

cards.title: Reclaiming Energetic Sovereignty
cards.description: Methods for reinforcing inner strength, sovereignty, and breaking energetic chains of manipulation.
bulletpoints: Severing ritual-based energetic bindings and oaths.
Reclaiming lost personal energy and restoring balance.
Strengthening internal willpower against esoteric coercion.
cards.summaryText: Guides the severing of bindings, retrieval of scattered energy, and fortifying of will against occult coercion.
